theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Caloric Restriction and Dietary Restriction Theories
theory_assignments.reasoning: This theory focuses on caloric restriction as a nutritional intervention that extends lifespan and delays age-related diseases, fitting well with other CR/DR theories.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Caloric Restriction and Dietary Restriction Theories
theory_assignments.reasoning: Dietary restriction theory emphasizing reduced caloric intake and signaling pathways mediating lifespan extension aligns with CR/DR mechanisms.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Caloric Restriction and Dietary Restriction Theories
theory_assignments.reasoning: Explores metabolic adaptations and lifespan extension by caloric restriction, consistent with CR/DR mechanistic themes.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Caloric Restriction and Dietary Restriction Theories
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on body weight, fat mass, and lifespan extension by caloric restriction, fitting the CR/DR cluster.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Caloric Restriction and Dietary Restriction Theories
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes physiological effects of caloric restriction in primates and humans, consistent with CR/DR mechanisms.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Caloric Restriction and Dietary Restriction Theories
theory_assignments.reasoning: Summarizes CR effects on longevity and healthspan in primates, fitting the CR/DR cluster.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Caloric Restriction and Dietary Restriction Theories
theory_assignments.reasoning: DR theory in rotifers involving nutrient sensing and hormesis aligns with CR/DR mechanisms.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Caloric Restriction and Dietary Restriction Theories
theory_assignments.reasoning: Dietary restriction theory emphasizing TOR signaling and autophagy fits well within CR/DR cluster.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Caloric Restriction and Dietary Restriction Theories
theory_assignments.reasoning: Discusses species-specific effects of caloric restriction and trade-offs with reproduction, consistent with CR/DR themes.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Caloric Restriction and Dietary Restriction Theories
theory_assignments.reasoning: Energy allocation theory linking dietary intake, reproduction, and longevity fits with CR/DR and resource trade-off mechanisms.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproduction and Longevity Trade-Off Theories
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on reproduction-longevity trade-offs and distinct physiological mechanisms underlying lifespan extension, fitting reproduction trade-off cluster.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproduction and Longevity Trade-Off Theories
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes reciprocal costs of reproduction and aging in fruit flies, emphasizing life-history trade-offs.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproduction and Longevity Trade-Off Theories
theory_assignments.reasoning: Disposable Soma theory emphasizing trade-offs between reproduction and somatic maintenance fits reproduction-longevity trade-off cluster.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproduction and Longevity Trade-Off Theories
theory_assignments.reasoning: Life-history trade-offs in dogs linking body size, metabolism, and lifespan align with reproduction and longevity trade-off mechanisms.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproduction and Longevity Trade-Off Theories
theory_assignments.reasoning: Reproductive signaling in C. elegans showing germline removal extends lifespan fits reproduction-longevity trade-off cluster.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Molecular Mobility and Biophysical Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Unique mechanistic theory focusing on molecular mobility in cytoplasm and glassy state effects on aging, distinct from other clusters.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling and FOXO-Mediated Aging Theories
theory_assignments.reasoning: Core insulin/IGF-1 signaling pathway theory with neuroendocrine regulation and FOXO involvement fits this cluster.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Insulin/IGF-1 signaling and sirtuin-dependent lifespan extension involving daf-16/FOXO fits this cluster.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Insulin receptor mutation and methionine metabolism reprogramming affecting lifespan via insulin signaling fits this cluster.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Insulin-like signaling regulating dauer longevity assurance program via FOXO fits this cluster.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Reduced insulin/IGF-1 signaling extending lifespan via DAF-16/FOXO fits this cluster.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Insulin/IGF signaling modulation via dFOXO-dilp6 feedback loop fits insulin/IGF-1 and FOXO cluster.

theory_assignments.reasoning: DAF-16/FOXO-mediated longevity regulation via unc-43 and egl-8 signaling fits insulin/IGF-1 and FOXO cluster.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: ROS and Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Interaction Theories
theory_assignments.reasoning: ROS-mediated modulation of insulin signaling pathway in diapause and lifespan extension highlights ROS-insulin signaling interaction.
